name: capitolExt
val: CAPITOL RECORDS TOWER - decrepit and abandoned - leans precariously in the background.

name: hosExt
val: In front of the building’s Art Deco rotunda and towering curved facade,
EXTRA: a media circus of paparazzi, reporters and fans gather behind barricades.

name: hosSteps
val: The steps of the Hall of Justice

name: monocorpExt
val: The awe-inspiring MONOCORP Tower is a 91-story, golden, art deco tapered obelisk. On the building’s illuminated ornamental CROWN, a giant four-sided jumbotron video screen broadcasts a montage of Monocorp products.

name: monocorpPenthouse
val: Monocorp’s penthouse media center overlooks the city. CIGARETTE SMOKE wafts in the air. a raised stage surrounded by video screens

name: sssInt
val: The dark shadowy club features cheaply designed stage props
EXTRA: The club features a cheaply designed fiberglass, foam alien garden set design. It’s a faux bio-luminescent grassland teeming with “exotic” plants and underwater coral reefs and plankton. More depressing than magical.

name: boardRoomInt
val: Corporate boardroom with full screen video presentation

name: ConferenceRoom
val: The conference room is dark and accented by ambient lighting. A glowing, circular WAR TABLE is in the center surrounded by VIDEO SCREEN walls with ads of Roxie Star
EXTRA: The conference room is dark and accented by ambient lighting. A glowing, circular WAR TABLE is in the center surrounded by VIDEO SCREEN walls that loop ultra stylish Monocorp consumer ads for everything from weapons to breakfast cereal.

name: prisonExt
val: Decrepit Hotel prison, barbed wire neon sign

name: opiumint
val: Club Opium is a mix of a luxurious Parisian cabaret, a hookah bar, and an imitation of opium dens of the past.

name: sssext
val: Siamese Sex Show - an augmented reality sex club. Just outside the entrance is the hologram of a creepy vintage HOLLYWOOD MOVIE USHER (white, 23, ghoulish face with classic jacket, trousers, hat and flashlight.) Ash falls like snowflakes.

name: wetMarket
val: a BAZAAR with CHRISTMAS LIGHTS strung up over WET MARKETS and RATIONING BOOTHS.

name: hosInt.
val: Art-deco inspired interior combines flickering lights, twisted and distorted geometric patterns, and shadows.
